entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SortedSet.IsSubsetOf not working as expected #102118
  • Consider despawning idle SRV GC threads when DATAS is in use #102116
  • [API Proposal]: `GetLongOffset` and `GetLongOffsetAndLength` #102114
  • `GetFromJsonAsAsyncEnumerable` not working when using custom httpHanlder with compression #102113
  • [API Proposal]: AsyncContext for cancellation and ConfigureAwait #102111
  • Why doesn't CLR immediately release local objects that leave the scope? #102109
  • [API Proposal]: Should we design a DnsClient abstract class? #102105

Closed

  • Assigning a ROM<byte> field to 'default' produces optimal codegen over assigning it to ROM<byte>.Empty #49834
    Future
  • Slow thread suspension in busy loop #94767
    9.0.0
  • Strange behavior of IntersectBy #102112
  • JIT is missing a common case to track the IsNeverNegative assertion #102088
    9.0.0
  • mono gc not set static field back after object moved when enable interp mode #100065

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Unify `GT_JMP` handling in the backends #102117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix build break in outer loop runtime tests #102115
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid allocations in HTTP/1.1 connection pool #102108
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE cleanup - More SVE format merging #102104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve

Merged

  • JIT: Expand optRelopImpliesRelop for constants as op1 #102024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use BoundsCheckNoThrow assertion in optAssertionProp_RangeProperties #102089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add missing GC wbarriers for static field stores with hotreload enabled #100775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 1 #101950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement SVE Math *Multiply* APIs #102007
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Fix Mono.Linker.Tests build #102102
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • TimeSpanConverter: Less restrict in-range check to allow more timespan formats that would be accepted by Utf8Parser.TryParse #102091
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Spanify some ``Utf8String`` and ``Utf8StringBuilder`` use #102101
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64: avoid memory barrier in InlinedMemmoveGCRefsHelper if dest is not on heap #102084
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix VirtualCallStubManager stats capturing on EE shutdown #102073
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change the ReciprocalEstimate and ReciprocalSqrtEstimate APIs to be mustExpand on RyuJIT #102098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disable tests failing on NAOT #102065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102096
    area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.x
  • Tiny improvement of `StringBuilder.Append(StringBuilder)` #101020
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix invalid operand register in the emitted addition/subtraction code #102074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Where possible, use ReadableStream.pipeTo to load files into the heap #101982
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable custom mmap in MT builds #102064
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Root .resources.dll from transitive PackageReference not copied to build output #40834

Closed

  • Enable `dotnet sln` to add SLN-level files #9112
    Backlog
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64]x64 sdk gets stuck during installation and cannot be installed normally on ARM64. #40346

PullRequests

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Use inline differences for specification updates in semi-auto-properties.md #8113

Updated

  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal] Linq-like APIs for analyzers #73436

Closed

  • Analyzers should only include libraries not provided by the framework #71952

PullRequests

Created

  • Partial properties: attributes #73437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make placement of raw string guide line independent of the space chars used #73435
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove virtual from 'SourceMethodSymbolWithAttributes.SyntaxNode' #73433
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Partial properties: basic indexer scenarios and signature mismatch diagnostics #73378
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Net9 Reference Assemblies #73423
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #55676
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json, plaintext #55675
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #55674
  • Explicitly calling `context.Fail(....)` in authorization policy requirement handler results in empty `policyAuthorizationResult.AuthorizationFailure.FailedRequirements` #55673
  • Performance Challenges of Blazor Server Applications in Low Bandwidth Environments Compared to MVC and Traditional Web Applications #55671
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mapaction, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #55670
  • Perf regression: json, json, mvc #55669
  • Perf improvement: caching, json, mapaction #55667

Closed

  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #55626
    9.0-preview5
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55621
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55620

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55640
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55641
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55642
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55643
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #55644
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #55646
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55645
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #55647
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext #55661
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55668
  • HttpRequest.BodyReader.TryRead returns false even though request has a body #55615
  • Adding Roles in Blazor Web App Gives Exception #55672

PullRequests

Created

  • Make DefaultProblemDetailsFactory public #55666
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Updated

  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Freezing App when Navigating Between Tabs with BlazorWebView in Maui Blazor App #22344
  • MudBlazor Dialog does not works in Maui Blazor. #22343
  • [windows] Processing Resources failed with error: Duplicate Entry #22342

Closed

  • ListView duplicate first item #10582
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] [WinUI] An exception is thrown after removing an item from its close button #16324
  • navHost cannot be null after app2app #15788

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix frame ping #22347
  • [Windows] Improve performance of `ContentPanel.EnsureBorderPath` #22346
    platform/windows 🪟, area-perf, community ✨
  • [Android] InputTransparent="true" on a Layout breaks child controls - Fix #22345
    community ✨

Merged

  • Flakey test fixes #22338
    area-testing
  • Update Versions.props #22341
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr5] Flakey test fixes #22340
    area-testing

Updated

  • Add unit test for button images in layouts #21651
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Install bits for UITest to run #22333
    area-testing
  • Add Frame observer for UIWindow frame changes #20237
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-frame
  • Fix Windows device tests #20401
    area-testing
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius - fix #21259
    legacy-area-controls, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, legacy-area-controls, community ✨
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, legacy-area-controls, community ✨
  • [Controls] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #22102
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • Facing issues with the Entry, DatePicker, and CheckBox components when applying themes - Fix #21826
    legacy-area-controls, community ✨, area-theme
  • [Android] Support for images inside HTML label #21679
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Enforce CA1854 performance analyzer #22100
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • Reuse/share the Button RippleDrawable logic with ImageButton #22298
    platform/android 🤖, legacy-area-controls, area-controls-button
  • [Trimming] Add ILC compilation test of all assemblies #22328
    area-publishing
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, legacy-area-controls, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-listview, memory-leak 💦
  • Bump to 8.0.60 #22339
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
